synopsis.text:
Joker, the enigmatic and elusive thief, possesses an uncanny ability to steal anything, leaving no treasure safe from his grasp. With a repertoire of magic tricks that blur the lines between science and sorcery, he embarks on daring heists around the world, leaving authorities baffled and spectators awestruck. Despite their relentless pursuit using advanced technology and specialized agents, Joker remains one step ahead, evading capture with flair and panache.

One fateful night, while attempting to steal the coveted Dragon Gem from a tycoon's mansion, Joker crosses paths with Hachi, an endearing yet clumsy ninja. Despite Hachi's initial admiration for Joker, the thief dismisses him as a nuisance. However, Hachi's wit, courage, and unexpected domestic skills eventually earn him a reluctant apprenticeship under Joker.

Together, the duo embarks on a thrilling adventure, facing off against rival phantom thieves and reconnecting with old acquaintances. Their ultimate goal: to claim the elusive Timeslip Treasure. As they navigate through a world filled with cunning traps, high-stakes competitions, and relentless police pursuit, Joker and Hachi strive to become the greatest 'magicians' of the night. Will they succeed, or will their daring escapades finally catch up with them? Only time will tell in this exhilarating tale of thievery and adventure.
